text.en: Cannot be destroyed by monster effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Gold Sarcophagus of Light" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can add 1 card from your Deck to your hand that mentions "Gold Sarcophagus of Light", except "Gold Sarcophagus of Light". If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) from the GY: You can discard 1 Spell, then target 1 of those monsters; send it to the GY.
